profile.profileName: [Anthology Film Archives, NYC] Collection management system for film archive.
profile.profileDescription: This custom profile configures CA for a film archive.

label.name_singular: Digital film still from a 16mm film
label.name_plural: Digital film still from a 16mm film

label.name_singular: Digital film still from a 8mm film
label.name_plural: Digital film still from a 8mm film

label.name_singular: Digital film still from a 35mm film
label.name_plural: Digital film still from a 35mm film

label.name_singular: Photographs glued to a piece of black mat board
label.name_plural: Photographs glued to a piece of black mat board

label.name_singular: Photographs glued to a piece of white mat board
label.name_plural: Photographs glued to a piece of white mat board

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of item description. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: GeoNames
label.description: A Geographic lookup that takes search text, passes it to the GeoNames search service and provides a dropdown with search results (ordered by score). Selected geoname is stored as both text (name, country, continent and ID) and the service URL identifier.

label.name: Library of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Old Archive Identifier
label.description: Legacy identifiers that are associated with this asset.

label.name: Release Format
label.description: The format of the production when it was released.

label.name: Number of Reels
label.description: number of reels in completed production

label.name: Date
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the lifecycle of the resource.

label.name: Date (text field)
label.description: Text field for legacy dates. Needed for data import.

label.name: Base Scratching
label.description: rate the level of base scratching

label.name: Edge Code
label.description: edge code on film indicating year of manufacture

label.name: Emulsion Scratching
label.description: rate emulsion the level of scratching

label.name: Vinegar
label.description: Rate the level of vinegar syndrome

label.name: Coverage
label.description: The spatial or temporal topic of the resource

label.name: Type
label.description: The nature or genre of the resource.

label.name: Format
label.description: The file format or physical medium or dimensions of the resource.

label.name: Rights
label.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

label.name: Source
label.description: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.

label.name: Biography
label.description: Narrative biography for entity. This is the primary text used to document the entity.

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of entity biography. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Loan document
label.description: Any documentation related to the loan such as a Loan Agreement.

label.name: Shelf
label.description: The shelf location of an object.
